definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Zhuge Liang speculated that the river would be covered by fog in three days, which saved himself later.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: GuoLiang Zhou speculated that surface of river has fog and his speculation save himself.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: The sun shines upon the river.
The sun is warm now, the water of the river undisturbed.
sentences.chinese: 陽光正暖，江面水波不興。

sentences.english: Step on the embankment, the mood of the moment as the river this evening generally quiet.
sentences.chinese: 步上堤岸，心情瞬間就如這黃昏的江面一般寧靜。

sentences.english: Across the surface of the river was splashed the flaming gold of the sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 江面之上佈滿了初升的太陽的熔金之色。

sentences.english: With wide river surface, here is also a very good anchorage.
sentences.chinese: 此處江面寬闊，又是非常好的錨地。

sentences.english: The sun shone on the gold of her hair.
sentences.chinese: 江面之上佈滿了初升的太陽的熔金之色。

sentences.english: There is a new bridge flying over the river.
sentences.chinese: 江面上飛架起一座新橋。

sentences.english: Zhugeliang speculated that there would be fog in three days , he was saved by his speculation.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: This position clear at a glance down the entire river.
sentences.chinese: 這個位置居高臨下整個江面一目瞭然。

sentences.english: The small boat is rocking on the river.
Overlord critical, sees only the surface of the river to come a dozen of fishing small boat floatingly.
sentences.chinese: 霸王正在危急之中，只見江面飄飄來一打漁小舟。

sentences.english: The river, a hanging Bai Fan raised, standby.
sentences.chinese: 江面上，一掛掛白帆揚起，待命起航。

definition: Jiang'an district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei
opposite bank (of a body of water)
the bow or prow of a ship
